hero.headline: Charless Netumbare | Full-Stack Developer & Tech Explorer
hero.subline: Building secure fintech solutions, exploring robotics, and bridging the gap between physical discipline and digital innovation. Based in Harare, Africa.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a 21-year-old full-stack developer and basketball player (1.9m) from Harare, Africa. I believe in consistency, rapid learning, and pushing boundariesâ€”whether it's optimizing a full-stack system or running a 10km.

questbook.title: Leave a Quote

questbook.thankYou: Thank you! Your quote has been sent. I'll get back to you soon.
